## SeisFluid.borrowSAI() method

Adjust existing Trove by borrowing more SAI.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
borrowSAI(amount: Decimalish, maxBorrowingRate?: Decimalish, overrides?: SeisTransactionOverrides): Promise<TroveAdjustmentDetails>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | The amount of SAI to borrow. |
|  maxBorrowingRate | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Maximum acceptable [borrowing rate](./lib-base.fees.borrowingrate.md)<!-- -->. |
|  overrides | [SeisTransactionOverrides](./lib-ethers.etherstransactionoverrides.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[TroveAdjustmentDetails](./lib-base.troveadjustmentdetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Exceptions

Throws [SeisTransactionFailedError](./lib-ethers.etherstransactionfailederror.md) in case of transaction failure. Throws [SeisTransactionCancelledError](./lib-ethers.etherstransactioncancellederror.md) if the transaction is cancelled or replaced.

## Remarks

Equivalent to:

```typescript
adjustTrove({ borrowSAI: amount }, maxBorrowingRate)

```
